about_the_game:
Zilar: Empire of the Underground revolves around the story of a magical book within the game and invites you on a unique adventure.

The hero of our story, Zemandev, embarks on a perilous journey to reclaim the magical crown inherited from his ancestor, the Grand Master Zonaran. This mystical crown has been seized by the Yeclers and their leader, Zilar, who were once thought to exist only in legends. To prevent the devastating wars between humans and Yeclers from reigniting and to reclaim his lost legacy, Zemandev ventures into Zilar’s underground empire.

On this journey, you must overcome the obstacles set by Zilar and the Yeclers, uncover the dark secrets of the past, and fight to reclaim your inheritance. Your courage and wit will be the keys to this epic quest.

Engage in relentless battles with the Yeclers and develop strategies to defeat your enemies. Utilize the three distinct modes of your weapon to adapt your tactics to any situation and turn the battlefield to your advantage.

While escaping from Zilar, test your speed and agility in the challenging parkours of the underground empire. Climb walls, leap over platforms, and use your surroundings to evade enemies. Stay vigilant with every step—each parkour will test your bravery.

Solve challenging puzzles and uncover the mysteries hidden behind locked doors. Reveal the secrets of the past step by step and use your intellect to advance.

CONCTACT

Gmail: sthardgamestsup@gmail.com

Discord:

Instagram: zyfzzr, keremcemmyldz
detailed_description:
Wishlists

Our goal is to reach 10,000 wishlists to bring our game to more players! If you haven’t added our game to your wishlist yet, you can do it now and follow us to learn more about the game.

Thank you to everyone who believes in our project, supports us, and adds our game to their wishlist!

name: Zilar: Empire Of The Underground

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 2 GB | AMD Radeon R7 360, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 | AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780, 3 GB | AMD Radeon R9 290X, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Zilar: Empire of the Underground is an exploration and adventure game that begins with our main character, Zemandev, losing the magical crown inherited from his ancestor, Zonaran.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
